title: Time for change?: electoral politics after the local and European elections
abstract: Tony Travers analyses the outcome of the 2009 local and European elections – contrasting the difference between first past the post and proportional representation-based results – and predicts trouble for Labour, whose support, he argues, has been reduced to its core vote
